full_summary:
# Tender Notice for the Joint Biometric Operational Capability (JBOC) Project
A Supply Arrangement (SA) notice is issued for the procurement of senior resources to support the Joint Biometric Operational Capability (JBOC) Project at the Department of National Defence (DND).

## Reference Information
* Reference Number: cb-208-77153058
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: W8474-25JBO6
* Publication Date: 2024-05-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-06-03 14:00:00 (Local Time)

## Project Overview
The JBOC Project requires two senior computer application support resources under category 5.1 Senior Computer Application Support. These resources will fill positions with public servants once the project achieves Final Operational Capability (FOC).

## Procurement Details
* Notice Type: Request for Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: CETA, CPTPP, CPFTA, WTO GPA, Canada-Honduras, Canada-UK TCA, Canada-Colombia, Canada-Chile, Canada-Ukraine, CFTA, CKFTA, and Canada-Panama
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Contracting Entity: DES Proc 3, DASE 3
* Contact Information: Bruce Boivin, MAT.DESProc.3-4.DOSE@forces.gc.ca, (343) 548-1901

## Attachments
Attachments are available on the Canada Buys website:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38681/w8474-25jb06-qa1.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38681/w8474-25jb06_ths-npp.pdf

## Supply Arrangement Details
The solicitation is for a Supply Arrangement, with an expected start date of 2024-06-17 and end date of 2024-11-29.

Please ensure to review all documents and requirements carefully before responding to this tender. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the contracting entity listed above. The tender closing date is firm, and late submissions will not be accepted. (Note to self
